subject: Some pigeons, Davy, a couple of short-legg'd hens, a joint of mutton, and any pretty little tiny kickshaws, tell William cook.
body:
There wasn't much traffic about, so I kept pushing 
the old noga through the floorboards near, and the Durango 95 ate up the road 
like spaghetti. I am not sufficiently interested in ethics to wish to have you 
hanged for it.
Let her wait, and pay her back gradually. However, 
for many years, this was the standard.
Disassembler assumes 32 bit code and data segments 
but correctly decodes prefixed 16-bit commands. Disclosed to others for any 
other purpose.
Dirk drummed his fingers in frustration.
At T=T1 the CPU fetches the opcode byte for the 
first instruction.
Disordered with wine and want of rest - that want 
which nothing, although he was so weary, would appease - these ideas and objects 
assumed a diseased importance in his thoughts.
